What would your mornings be without that first cup of coffee? It’s your fuel, your saving grace, and for some the prospect of that aroma is the only thing that gets them out of bed. If you love your java, you know that the right coffee maker can make all the difference.Enter the Le Creuset Stoneware French Press, a beautifully crafted accent designed to brew the perfect cup while adding an artisanal touch to your kitchen. A statement piece as much as a morning essential, it's now reduced by 30% to just $59.50.  Le Creuset Stoneware French Press  Add a touch of luxury to your kitchen with this gorgeous stoneware French press from Le Creuset. From the soft, pink-toned putty hue to the glazed stoneware, this is the perfect accent that lends immediate beauty to everyday breakfasts and Sunday brunches.Use it to brew your favorite coffee or even to brew loose tea leaves for a relaxing cup at any time of the day.  $59.50 (save 30%)  ShopYou’ll feel like a barista in your own home with this in your repertoire. One of its most impressive features is its standout stoneware construction. The striking piece not only looks amazing, but also retains your coffee’s heat for longer periods.Plus, the Le Creuset French press boasts a non-porous enamel finish, and is completely resistant to common concerns like staining, scratching, chipping, and pitting. It’s also glazed, so all you have to do is wipe it down for a quick cleanup.
Of course, it’s also safe to pop in the dishwasher, so you can be sure it will retain its gorgeous appearance no matter how often you use it.

And it’s not just for coffee! If you prefer, use it to brew loose tea leaves and enjoy a warm and soothing cup whenever the mood strikes. Sip some chamomile at the end of a long day, or indulge in something rich and sweet during the chilly winter months.The design of the Le Creuset Stoneware French Press lends itself to producing perfectly flavored drinks each time. It features a mesh sieve which effectively filters the ground coffee beans or loose tea when you plunge it into the press.‘Durable, beautiful, and makes deliciously smooth coffee,’ says one satisfied user. ‘Given its frequent use, this press has become a permanent counter fixture. One, because it's beautiful. Two, because we seriously use it all the time. And three because coffee makes me happy.’

Another shares, ‘Chic addition to the breakfast table. All in all it does exactly as it promises to do and is a beautiful complement to the table is all the colors it comes in.’If you’re looking for an effortlessly stylish piece for your kitchen that also happens to prepare the perfect cup every time, you won’t find anything better than the Le Creuset Stoneware French Press.
